attributes.action: Show EU Boris' idea by editing a copy of the Withdrawal Agreement text.
attributes.additional_details: All along the EU have been waiting for us to make suggestions. So let’s suggest properly not just verbally but actually put some work into producing new versions of the documents. In that editing we should think ahead, include clauses to mitigate as many problems and criticisms as we can predict, make it something harder dismiss out of hand.
attributes.background: Make it easier for the EU to start negotiating by actually editing a copy of the Withdrawal Agreement and the Future Relationship documents to reflect Boris’ suggestions and showing the Proposed Versions to them.
